data.Energy.Reactive.Import.Register: Reactive energy imported from the grid

data.Energy.Reactive.Import.Interval: Reactive energy imported from the grid during last interval

data.Power.Active.Import: Instantaneous active power imported by EV
data.Power.Factor: Instantaneous power factor of total energy flow
data.Power.Reactive.Export: Instantaneous reactive power exported by EV
data.Power.Reactive.Import: Instantaneous reactive power imported by EV
